CmdLine: curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_8.x | bash - &&     curl -sS https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/pubkey.gpg | apt-key add - &&     echo "deb https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/ stable main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/yarn.list &&     apt-get update && apt-get install -y          nodejs         yarn         wget     && apt-get -qyy autoremove     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*     && apt-get -qyy clean
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: wget -q -O - https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | apt-key add - &&   echo "deb http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google.list &&   apt-get update &&   apt-get install -y google-chrome-stable &&   rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
